abstract: This document compares hydraulic and mechanical access fitting systems, highlighting key considerations such as safety (leak paths and galling), logistics, time-saving aspects during servicing, and pressure ratings.
key_points: Mechanical fittings have 1 potential leak path.
The hydraulic system has 5 potential leak paths.
Mechanical and hydraulic access fittings can both be rated to 10'000psi and above, but the mechanical tools are only rated to 6000psi.
